### Notice Description

Health Canada has a requirement to verify and certify all Chemical Fume Hoods and Biological Safety Cabinets in three buildings located in the National Capital Region, Ottawa, Ontario, on an annual basis. Respondents are required to submit a proposal outlining the scope of their services. The tender documents provide more detailed information on the requirements for this project.
